title: data_leak
label: Data Leak
description: Monitors and alerts on unauthorized access or exposure of sensitive data, indicating potential data breaches.

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/115.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

requestHeader.example:
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VybmFtZSI6ImFkbWluIn0.Ks_K2N3QN7hVZQN5QYQYQ
Content-Length: 2048
Host: api.example.com
Connection: keep-alive
Accept: application/json
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Cookie: session_id=abc123def456; csrf_token=xyz789

responseHeader.example:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 512
Server: nginx/1.18.0
Date: Tue, 15 Aug 2023 14:32:25 GMT
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Set-Cookie: session_token=updated_789xyz; Path=/; HttpOnly

mailSubject.example: Quarterly Financial Report and Confidential Data for Review

name.example: Unauthorized File Upload to Cloud Storage Detected

message.example: Unauthorized file upload attempt detected: User admin attempted to upload confidential file confidential_data.xlsx from path C:\Users\admin\Documents\confidential_data.xlsx to cloud storage via API endpoint https://api.example.com/v1/files/upload using process excel.exe. The file, containing sensitive financial data, was potentially exfiltrated via cloudServices channel. The request originated from host WIN-PROD-SERVER01 (192.168.1.100) and was flagged due to the inclusion of an encryption key in the request body and the file's confidential nature. Action required: Investigate user activity and secure the data.

srcGeoAddress.example: 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20500, United States
